description: This file defines an external service function for adding log entries to a database, exporting the addLog function.

methods.name: addLog(level, message, userId = null)
methods.description: Adds a log entry with specified level, message, and optionally user ID into the Log table.

ctags.name: addLog
ctags.pattern: /^export async function addLog(level, message, userId = null) {$/
